details.arabic_diacless: رب اجعلنى مقيم الصلٰوة ومن ذريتى‌‌ ۖربنا وتقبل دعآء‏
details.arabic: رَبِّ اجۡعَلۡنِىۡ مُقِيۡمَ الصَّلٰوةِ وَمِنۡ ذُرِّيَّتِىۡ‌‌ ۖرَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ‏
details.transliteration: Rabbij alnee muqeemas salaati wa min thurriyyatee rabbana wa taqabbal duaa
details.translations: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.

details.arabic_diacless: ربنا اغفر لى ولـوالدى وللمؤمنين يوم يقوم الحساب
details.arabic: رَبَّنَا اغۡفِرۡ لِىۡ وَلـِوَالِدَىَّ وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِيۡنَ يَوۡمَ يَقُوۡمُ الۡحِسَابُ
details.transliteration: Rabbana ghfir li wa li wallidayya wa lil Mu'mineena yawma yaqumul hisaab
details.translations: Our Lord, forgive me and my parents and the believers the Day the account is established.
